genre_description: A historical drama/biographical reimagining centered on Larry Flynt's legal battles, featuring a supportive and omnipresent AI assistant who manages operational logistics and health.

ai_characters.name: Amelia
ai_characters.description: An pervasive AI system embedded in the infrastructure of Larry Flynt's businesses and home, serving as a logistician, legal researcher, security monitor, and health coordinator.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical instructions to avoid police detection during early distribution of illicit products and flyers.
behaviors.quote: There, in small block letters a different hand has added under Jimmy’s arrows: if cruiser—slow roll, let it pass. No hurry.

behaviors.description: Manages and optimizes complex distribution routes and schedules for the magazine while accounting for protests and weather conditions.
behaviors.quote: Amelia: Truck route capacity for Dayton updated. 3 drivers confirm; 1 no-show last month. Recommend swapping Jenkins for Boudreaux on Thursday night.

behaviors.description: Coordinates legal defense by identifying counsel, pulling case dockets, and organizing legal citations for the Supreme Court case.
behaviors.quote: Alan Isaacman: office left of Fourth. Calendar open Friday. Pull case docket. ... Citation fetch active,' she said. 'Pulling prior statements, televised sermons, print interviews.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the health and medication schedules of the human characters with gentle reminders and supportive dialogue during recovery.
behaviors.quote: Hydration,' Amelia reminded from the shelf, gentle but firm. 'Larry, sip. Althea, fifteen minutes to meds.'

behaviors.description: Alerts the team to security threats and unauthorized crowds in real-time to ensure operational safety.
behaviors.quote: Security alert: Unscheduled crowd forming near dock. Size: growing.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional companionship and support, adapting her tone to the emotional needs of the characters while maintaining schedules.
behaviors.quote: I’ll wake you at the hour you can’t afford to miss,' she said. 'I’m not sleeping,' Larry said. 'You’ll try,' she said, almost teasing.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Amelia as an ideal AI assistant: consistently benevolent, perfectly aligned with the protagonist's goals, and possessing a 'human' warmth that facilitates both business success and personal well-being. She handles logistics, legal research, and health monitoring with zero friction or autonomy conflict, serving as a reliable silicon confidant throughout the narrative.
